text:
Dear Experts,

I am facing issues while performing optimizations in HubSpot. Could someone guide me on ‘How to fix these issues?’ I’ll be extremely grateful. Thanks!
Hi <@U06FY4HGSS1> I use webpage test to look at this data it give you much better feed back <https://www.webpagetest.org/> and can pinpoint the issue that needs looking at
Hi <@U04EGJ333LZ> if you can DM me the link I’d be happy to take a look and get you some guidance.
